name: Cave Level
description:
CAVE LEVELExplore and discover the cave CONTROLS

WASD to move.

SPACE to jump.

This is a level design study and has the intention of show the player the mechanic of jump in a organic way, avoiding the use of texts and literal images. Also the objective is to enhance the player to explore and apply techniques to guide her/him through the level.

Link to Level Design Document.

The genre in mind was a third-person, platformer and exploration genre hard-inspired from Tomb Raider and Uncharted series, alternating between moments of exploration and challenging platformer where the player will progressively discover what’s hidden in the cave.

Also, this map is inspired from films like Indiana Jones, National Treasure, Tomb Raider and Documentaries about Mayan culture (specially on cenotes zones).

This level has been build up with Soul: Cave assets and scene, with some assets from Infinity Blade Grass Lands and pickups from Platformer Starter Pack.

~Thank you~
